message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $95 for it.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $85 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but I can't go below $90 for it. I think it's a fair price for the value you'll get.
I appreciate your stance, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $87.
